summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Scale Genius chord learning game. All core features working correctly including both game modes, timer functionality, scoring system, and progress tracking.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (POST /api/game/session, GET /api/game/stats, GET /api/game/stats/{key}, GET /api/game/high-scores)
Home page mode selection (Number→Chord and Chord→Number)
Setup page key selection (random vs preselected) and timer configuration
Number→Chord game mode with 24 chord buttons (12 major top, 12 minor bottom)
Chord→Number game mode with 6 number buttons
Score tracking and display during gameplay
Results page with accuracy percentage and game details
Dashboard statistics display with per-key performance
Visual feedback system for correct/incorrect answers
